derivation.yuyuan_name: Latin, from co- 'together with' + gnomen, nomen 'name'

means.word_mean: 1. a familiar name for a person (often a shortened version of a person's given name);

sentences.sentence: "Joe's mother would not use his nickname and always called him Joseph"

means.word_mean: 2. the name used to identify the members of a family (as distinguished from each member's given name)
